chapter.text: muccut tinara ativekamakac cellum kutiraikal mitu cattiyamaka
innum avai atikalaiyil (etirikal mitum) payntu cellum
(ittakaiya kutiraikal mitu cattiyamaka!) Niccayamaka manitan tan iraivanukku nanrikettavan avan
niccayamaka avan porulkalai mikka katinamakave necikkiran
avanaik kapriliruntu eluppappatum camayattil, avanutaiya ullattil ullavaiyellam ariyappattuvitum enpatai avan arintu kollavillaiya
avanaik kapriliruntu eluppappatum camayattil, avanutaiya ullattil ullavaiyellam ariyappattuvitum enpatai avan arintu kollavillaiya
niccayamaka manitarkalutaiya iraivan (tiyavan yar? Nallavan yar? Enru) avarkalai annalil nanku arintu kolvan
